pageContext.claim: “If we have 100 perfect years, the greatest years in the history of our country, we can't make it with 100 trillion spend on the Green New Deal.”
pageContext.analysis: Here, Trump take an absurd figure -- $100 trillion for the Green New Deal -- and then says the U.S. could never raise that amount of money. But the core of the Green New Deal is estimated at $18 trillion over 30 years, which is a lot of money but could be raised by the U.S. government. In fact, given that inflation reduces the value of the dollar over time, $100 trillion over 100 years could also be managed.
